title: Server Message Block
extract: In computer networking, Server Message Block (SMB), one version of which was also known as Common Internet File System (CIFS, /sɪfs/), operates as an application-layer network protocol mainly used for providing shared access to files, printers, and serial ports and miscellaneous communications between nodes on a ...
